message.content:

1. The feed URL was successfully updated to `https://feeds.feedburner.com/TechCrunch/test2`
2. The widget updated smoothly without any UI flicker (no full tab reload)
3. The feed items are still displayed correctly

Let me check the backend logs to confirm the improved functionality:
